questions.question: I was in the movie Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle and did't take a Salary.
questions.fact: The Jaguar's Eye is a large emerald who serves an important role in Jumanji, movies and video games alike. According to the legend removing the Jaguar's Eye will emit a curse upon Jumanji. It's special skills are zoology mind control, transportation, lighting torches and creating thunderstorms. Pretty impressive for a rock.
